ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: For a 12 lv i found that PAW is ideal place. South karanas is not a too dangerus place and here you can find also a centour village to sell goods, In paw there
ygData.messageBody:
For a 12 lv i found that PAW is ideal place. South karanas is not a too
dangerus place and here you can find also a centour village to sell goods,
In paw there are some nice places where snakes spawn they dont group and
you can sit in their nest killing it one after another as they spawn, also
dungeon is not too crowded and many times a party will accept a wizard as
root machine to help against trains. It is excelent dungeon to solo ans to
group play.

p.s. im now lv 15 and im in highold pass hunting orcs, very interesting and
specific place requiring all diferent tactics and here realy wizards have
some worth ehehehe.


At 20.52 30/05/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Alex Cordero" <gemini5719@...>
>
>Ok, i have a question. I played a wizard in the beta of this game, i got the
>game same day as it came out. I've been playing in the qeynos area for these
>past months and now i moved to freeport. I've noticed so many people that
>are in their 20's in levels even 30's. I'm only at level 12 and struggling
>to go up from here. I don't know if it's that most of the players are
>teenagers who play all the time since it's summer vacation or people just
>don't have lives but i play as much as my life let's me, as long as it
>doesn't interfere with work or hanging out on the weekends and i seem to go
>up so slow. I'm hunting now in the commonlands, I like to play solo and play
>in groups when i get a chance if I'm in the mood. Can someone tell me a good
>hunting spot or what's going on cause this is really starting to stress me.
>
>Thx,
> Atrus (Level 12, Karana server)
